tekoha.auth.chat.conflict: User already registered. Use %s to authenticate.
tekoha.auth.chat.delete: Password deleted. Use %s to register again.
tekoha.auth.chat.notfound: User not found. Use %s to register.
tekoha.auth.chat.unauthorized: Wrong password. If you need help, contact an administrator.
tekoha.auth.chat.unprocessable: The password must be between 6 and 64 characters long.
tekoha.auth.chat.welcome: Use %s to authenticate, or %s to register.
tekoha.auth.dialog.title: Authentication Form
tekoha.auth.dialog.signup: User not found. Create a new password to continue.
tekoha.auth.dialog.login: Type in your password to continue.
tekoha.auth.dialog.fail: Wrong password. If you need help, contact an administrator.
